#3.18
Print Static Analyzer Results
Using the "Admin" menu, you can save any display from the Static Analyzer as a PostScript file.  Then print this PostScript file through normal means.
Click on the "Admin" menu and select the "Save Query..." option.
Sorry.  You must click on the "Save Query" option of the "Admin" menu.
Great!  Your graph is saved in a PostScript file.
